text: James Alan Hetfield (born August 3, 1963) is an American guitarist, singer, and songwriter. He is an original member of the heavy metal band Metallica. ==Personal life== Hetfield married his wife Francesca Tomasi on August 17, 1997. They have three children. == References == Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Singer-songwriters from California Category:American rock guitarists Category:Metallica members Category:American heavy metal musicians Category:Musicians from Downey, California
title: James Hetfield
